1.17.1.3.3.4: vanilla potion icons are now disabled when potion hud is enabled

1.17.3.3.1:
released for 1.17
    added update notification system
1.17.3.3.4: vanilla potion icons are now disabled when potion hud is enabled

1.16.1.3.0:
- new mini mode for Potion HUD
 - Armor HUD now shows count of arrows in full plus inv mode
 - new Ingame config menu, where you can change position of the HUDs and toggle them on/off
1.16.1.3.1.0:
- new vertical mode for InventoryHUD
    - new mini mode for InventoryHUD
    - PotionHUD now has gap option
    - fixed bug when potions was rendering above debug screen
    - potion rendering system was reworked, now all potions from any mod should render
1.16.1.3.1.1:
- now one version for 1.16.1, 1.16.2 and 1.16.3
- new colors for armor hud
- fixed issue #8 By just_some_user
- fixed issue #7 By just_some_user
- changed default key binding for options, now 'O'
- key binding for options is now open full config screen instead of changing position
1.16.1.3.1.2: - added new option in armor hud config (durability bars)
1.16.1.3.1.3:
- fixed issue with loading config
 - fixed some texts issues
1.16.1.3.1.4: fixed issue with potion level icon

1.16.2.3.1.0:
- new vertical mode for InventoryHUD
    - new mini mode for InventoryHUD
    - PotionHUD now has gap option
    - fixed bug when potions was rendering above debug screen
    - potion rendering system was reworked, now all potions from any mod should render

1.16.2.3.2.0:
New features:
 - new Inventory HUD background (with configurable alpha)
 - Disebleable ArmorHUD numbers
 - every item in ArmorHUD now moveble
 - new config screen
Bug fixes:
 - fixed issue when quiver and inventory icons rendered wrong with left-handed players.
 - fixed issue when lang files didn't work.
1.16.2.3.3.0:
added animation for recently picked up items
added possibility to hide InventoryHUD background if inventory is empty
changed size of InventoryHUD background 
added new option for ArmorHUD - show overall item count for main/off hand
ArmorHUD is now scalable
added new horizontal mode for PotionHUD
added keybind for toggle on/off Potion and Armor HUDs

1.15.2.2.0: New features: armor damage hud & potions hud
1.15.2.2.1: Custom effects from most of mods now works correctly
1.15.2.2.2:
- Now you can change PotionHUD orientation from LEFT to RIGHT
- Now you can change ArmorStatusHUD orientation from MIDDLE to LEFT or RIGHT, also you can change position.
- New ConfigGUI
1.15.2.2.2.1: Armor orientation fixes and Potion Y pos fixes
1.15.2.2.3: Now u can hide armor if durability is above what u set in config..
1.15.2.2.4: new types of Orientation and you can change Orientation of any HUD
1.15.2.2.5:
- Now PotionHUD shows levels of the effects
- Now you can change alpha of PotionHUD background. Suggested by pyrezombie
- Fixed Issue #3 by SelfyxT
1.15.2.2.6: ArmorStatus HUD now contains main and off hand items, and also counter of inventory empty slots, you can switch type and durability view via config
1.15.2.3.0:
- new mini mode for Potion HUD
 - Armor HUD now shows count of arrows in full plus inv mode
 - new Ingame config menu, where you can change position of the HUDs and toggle them on/off
1.15.2.3.1.0:
- new vertical mode for InventoryHUD
    - new mini mode for InventoryHUD
    - PotionHUD now has gap option
    - fixed bug when potions was rendering above debug screen
    - potion rendering system was reworked, now all potions from any mod should render

- new colors for armor hud
- fixed issue #8 By just_some_user
- fixed issue #7 By just_some_user
- changed default key binding for options, now 'O'
- key binding for options is now open full config screen instead of changing position
1.15.2.3.1.2: - added new option in armor hud config (durability bars)
1.15.2.3.1.3:
- fixed issue with loading config
 - fixed some texts issues
1.15.2.3.1.4: fixed issue with potion level icon

 - new Inventory HUD background (with configurable alpha)

 - new config screen

 - fixed issue when quiver and inventory icons rendered wrong with left-handed players.
 - fixed issue when lang files didn't work.
